name: Peanut butter Oatmeal Bars
method: Heat up peanut butter and honey in a pot and mix thoroughly
Add rolled oats, one cup at a time while mixing
Dump it all in a pan or a container and put it in the fridge
Let it cool and cut it up in bars and/or squares
variants: Substituting some or all of the honey with bananas seems to turn out great
Melting some white chocolate and drizzling a small about over the bars and squares is out of this world
